sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update MailTrax State to Approved - Ready to Finalize
Set When Needed to value output from Increment Days Action. Set State to Awaiting Approval. Set Approval to Not Yet Requested
Send notification to people in the Requested by field that the letter has been approved
Calculate a future date based on x business days
Send notification to people in the Route to field that a letter approval request has been requested
Update MailTrax State to Not Approved - Re-submit
Get approval from person routed to
Send notification to people in the Requested by field that the letter has been rejected
